polimi.reds.broker.overlay
Interface Link

public interface Link

A data link between two REDS brokers. Each Link is associated with a Transport. It hides the protocol to send and receive data (i.e., any Serializable object) between neighboring brokers. Each data item has an associated subject (a String) that can be used by the upper layers to distinguish between different types of data.

See Also:
Transport

Method Summary
 void close()
          Closes the link.
 Transport getTransport()
          Gets the Transport this link is associated to.
 boolean isConnected()
          Checks if the link is connected.
 void send(java.lang.String subject, java.io.Serializable data)
          Sends a data item with the specific subject to the neighbor connected through this link.
 

Method Detail

close

void close()
Closes the link. After a link is closed it is removed from the transport and cannot be reopened.

isConnected

boolean isConnected()
Checks if the link is connected. When created through the Transport.openLink method the link is connected. To disconnect it the close must be called.

Returns:
true if the link has not been closed, false otherwise.

send

void send(java.lang.String subject,
          java.io.Serializable data)
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 NotConnectedException,
                 NotRunningException
Sends a data item with the specific subject to the neighbor connected through this link.

Parameters:
subject - the subject of the data.
data - the data to send.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
NotConnectedException - if the link is not connected (i.e., it has been closed).
NotRunningException - if the transport is not running.

getTransport

Transport getTransport()
Gets the Transport this link is associated to.

Returns:
the Transport this link is associated to.
